title: [K-12] Mobile-Based Problem-Centered Heart Failure Health Education Design Project

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic medical terminology and elementary education methodologies
context.additional_context: Project where pre-service teachers design and evaluate heart failure patient education materials using mobile apps

learning_goals: Achieve the ability to convert core concepts of heart failure management into mobile problem scenarios
